ForEach.ForEach.Body:
copy ".\src\${Field1}\bin\%BUILD_FLAVOR_DIR%\${Field1}.dll" "%PACKAGE_DIR%\." IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 goto pkgError
copy ".\src\${Field1}\bin\%BUILD_FLAVOR_DIR%\${Field1}.xml" "%PACKAGE_DIR%\." IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 goto pkgError
copy ".\src\${Field1}\bin\%BUILD_FLAVOR_DIR%\${Field1}.pdb" "%PACKAGE_DIR%\." IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 goto pkgError

copy "..\..\src\${Field1}\bin\%BUILD_FLAVOR_DIR%\${Field1}.dll" "%PACKAGE_DIR%\lib\TextMetal\." IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 goto pkgError
copy "..\..\src\${Field1}\bin\%BUILD_FLAVOR_DIR%\${Field1}.xml" "%PACKAGE_DIR%\lib\TextMetal\." IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 goto pkgError
copy "..\..\src\${Field1}\bin\%BUILD_FLAVOR_DIR%\${Field1}.pdb" "%PACKAGE_DIR%\lib\TextMetal\." IF %ERRORLEVEL% NEQ 0 goto pkgError

<%= this.Html.LabelFor(m => m.${Field1}, "${Field1}") %>
<%= this.Html.TextBoxFor(m => m.${Field1}, new { @class = "secass-input-text" }) %> <%= this.Html.ValidationMessageFor(m => m.${Field1}) %>
